concept.title: June 1, 2017
concept.shortdesc: Release Notes for the June 1, 2017 release.

row.entry: Added an enhancement to allow users in App Content to download native video files that were uploaded to a Livefyre App and/or via the Upload Media API.
Fixed a bug in Mosaic that was preventing newly created Mosaic's from loading after a page refresh.
Fixed a bug that caused Rights Management to break on newly deleted/marked-as-private Instagram and Twitter content.

Updated the sorting labels in Storify 2 to match the expected behavior. "Oldest to newest" and "Newest to oldest" will now say "First to last" and "Last to first". The sort order is based on the order dictated in Storify 2's Editor, not publish date.
Fixed a bug in Reviews to ensure media loads via HTTPS in all implementations.
Fixed a bug that caused Instagram Location Search results to show duplicates.
Enhanced Sidesnotes to support front-end moderation. This means moderators logged into the app on the front-end will be able to approve or delete content.
Added an enhancement to Twitter Streams so that all map locations are listed in the rule summary
Fixed a bug that allowed a Twitter Stream user to exist in both the "is posted by any of these authors" and "is not posted by any of these authors" fields at the same time.
Added the ability to filter Tweets by Language in Stream Rules
